CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Prepare for Pickup stage positioned above or below the Select Carrier or Service stage?
SRP.A: The Prepare for Pickup stage is positioned {below} the Select Carrier or Service stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Begin Transportation?
VE.A: The value of stage Begin Transportation is {599}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Transport Service?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Transport Service is {1625}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Prepare for Pickup?
VE.A: The value of stage Prepare for Pickup is {1025}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Select Carrier or Service, with a value of {2651}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Provide Feedback or Rating, with a value of {494}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating?
SC.A: Decreased by {97} Thousand Shipments from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1325? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {2651}, the {Book Transport Service} stage has {1625}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 542? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Provide Feedback or Rating} stage has {494}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 542 and 1325? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1025}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {599}, the {Complete Delivery} stage has {591}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to {Prepare for Pickup} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, or from stage Select Carrier or Service to Book Transport Service?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Carrier or Service} to {Book Transport Service} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to stage {Prepare for Pickup} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Select Carrier or Service} and {Book Transport Service} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Begin Transportation} and {Complete Delivery} stages.
